mapper.select: select id as id, buyer_shipping_no as buyerShippingNo, company_code as companyCode, company as company, `number` as number, context as context, status as status, is_check as isCheck, log_at as logAt, created_time as createdTime, updated_time as updatedTime from mall_shop_shipping_log where `number`=#{number} order by createdTime desc limit 1

select id as id, buyer_shipping_no as buyerShippingNo, company_code as companyCode, `company` as company, `number` as number, context as context, `status` as status, is_check as isCheck, log_at as logAt, created_time as createdTime, updated_time as updatedTime from mall_buyer_shipping_log where buyer_shipping_no in
#{buyerShippingNo}
